alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 6:08PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Evangeline, southwestern Avoyelles and northwestern St. Landry Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Indian Lake, or 9 miles south of Bunkie. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bayou Chicot, Whiteville, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, and St. Landry. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 37 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
